title: Single Tree
description: Let's have a single tree to organize all files related to content.

children.value: Let's have a single tree to organize all files related to content.
for files supported by nuxt content (md, json, yaml)
for files not content aware (jpeg, wbep, svg, ...)
some other folders of many file types related to other part of the platform (API, business logic design docs, file samples, ...)
